description:
A tie-down strap with a twist. The buckle has two different configurations: standard loop or lockout, which gives you a loop at either end, joined in the centre at the buckle. Strong enough to attach boats, boards, bikes (or a sofa on moving day) to the roof of your vehicle.

  • Multiple configurations make it versatile for all gear
  • Made of waterproof, high density polypropylene webbing
  • 2.54cm wide
  • Sewn-in, color coded and numerically labeled tags
  • Die-cast zinc alloy tensioning mechanism with nickel plate finish
  • Tensioning mechanism allows for a controlled release
  • Working load limit is 318kg. Breaking strength is 953kg
name: Nite Ize CamJam Tie Down Strap
